game: "Capture the Queen" (players 2) (equipment { (board (square 8)) (piece "Queen" Each ("SlideCapture")) }) (rules (start { (place "Queen2" coord:"D8") (place "Queen1" {"B1" "C1" "E1" "F1"}) }) (play (forEach Piece)) (end { ("CaptureAll" P2) (if (= (count Moves) 100) (result P2 Win)) }) )
